description: Fill in your bingo duty return form online

sections.title: About you
sections.description: Provide your information before telling us about your business

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: If this is a UK landline or an overseas number, you must include the area or dialling code.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example: director, company, secretary, agent

sections.title: Business details
sections.description: This is your registered business address. We will ask you later about additional sites for this return.

fields.label: Return period start date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 01/10/2016.

fields.label: Return period end date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 31/12/2016.

fields.label: Amount due as payments for playing bingo in the return period
fields.helpText: Include the total value of all payments due to you or received by you from players taking part in a game of bingo. This includes cards and participation fees but does not include admissions or member fees.

fields.label: Amount spent on winnings in the return period
fields.helpText: Include the total value of all winnings, including money prizes and the VAT-inclusive value of prizes and vouchers.

fields.label: Bingo losses carried forward from the previous return period
fields.helpText: Enter any losses you declared in the previous accounting period. Enter 0 if you have no losses.

fields.label: Have any underdeclarations been made in previous return periods?
Amount underdeclared in previous return periods
fields.helpText: Enter any duty under-declarations made in previous returns other than those notified in writing to HMRC.
